      • createAssessmentFromText

        public boolean createAssessmentFromText(java.lang.String sessionid,
                               java.lang.String siteid,
                               java.lang.String siteproperty,
                               java.lang.String title,
                               java.lang.String description,
                               java.lang.String template,
                               java.lang.String textdata)
                                 throws AxisFault
        createAsessmentFromText - WS Endpoint, exposing the SamLite createImportedAssessment()
        Parameters:
        String - sessionid the id of a valid admin session
        String - siteid the enterprise/sakai id of the site to be archived
        String - siteproperty the property that holds the enterprise site id
        String - title the title of the assessment
        String - description the description of the assessment
        String - template the assessment template name to use when importing the assessment *note templates must be created with admin user
        String - textdata the question data in the word2qti format
        Returns:
        boolean returns true if assessment created successfully, false if assessment is null
        Throws:
        AxisFault - WS TestsAndQuizzes.createAssessmentFromText(): SamLiteService.parse() returned a null QuestionGroup WS TestsAndQuizzes.createAssessmentFromText(): SamLiteService.createDocument() returned a null QTI Document

                                 java.lang.String siteid,
                                 java.lang.String siteproperty,
                                 java.lang.String xmlstring)
                                   throws AxisFault
        createAsessmentFromExport - WS Endpoint, exposing the SamLite createImportedAssessment()
        Parameters:
        String - sessionid the id of a valid admin session
        String - siteid the enterprise/sakai id of the site to be archived
        String - siteproperty the property that holds the enterprise site id
        String - xmlstring the IMS QTI document containing the assessment
        Returns:
        boolean returns true if assessment created successfully, false if assessment is null
        Throws:
        AxisFault - WS TestsAndQuizzes.createAssessmentFromXml(): returned a null QTI Document WS TestsAndQuizzes.createAssessmentFromXml(): " + e.getMessage

                                     java.lang.String siteid,
                                     java.lang.String siteproperty,
                                     java.lang.String xmlfile)
                                       throws AxisFault
        createAsessmentFromExportFile - WS Endpoint, exposing the SamLite createImportedAssessment()
        Parameters:
        String - sessionid the id of a valid admin session
        String - siteid the enterprise/sakai id of the site to be archived
        String - siteproperty the property that holds the enterprise site id
        String - xmlfile path to the IMS QTI document containing the assessment
        Returns:
        boolean returns true if assessment created successfully, false if assessment is null
